item.title: Adminyell modyell
item.dc:creator: @Runes_Are_Cool Runes Are Cool?
item.description:
@Runes_Are_Cool wrote:

   if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights == 1) {                    
                
			yell("[Moderator]"+playerName+":  " + command.substring(5));
	}
	 if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 2) {                    
                
			yell("[Administrator]"+playerName+":  " + command.substring(5));
	}

  
     if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights == 0) {                    
                if(combatLevel < 110) {
                    sM("Get to level 110 and then you can yell.");
               } else if(combatLevel >= 110) {
			yell("["+playerName+"]:  " + command.substring(5));
	}}

Gave you a little bit extra.:]

Read full topic

item.title: Adminyell modyell
item.dc:creator: @project_fallout project fallout
item.description:
@project_fallout wrote:

outside your yell method, then the cmd

if (command.startsWith("modyell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) { String titles = ""; if (playerRights == 0 && playerIsMember == 1) { titles = "[PLAYER] "; } if (playerRights == 1) { titles = "[MODERATOR] "; } if (playerRights == 2) { titles = "[ADMIN] "; } if (playerRights == 3) { titles = "[CO-OWNER] "; } if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("BLACKSABATH")) { titles = "[OWNER]- "; } modYell(titles + "" + playerName + ": " + command.substring(8)); }if (command.startsWith("adminyell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) { String titles = ""; if (playerRights == 0 && playerIsMember == 1) { titles = "[PLAYER] "; } if (playerRights == 1) { titles = "[MODERATOR] "; } if (playerRights == 2) { titles = "[ADMIN] "; } if (playerRights == 3) { titles = "[CO-OWNER] "; } if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("BLACKSABATH")) { titles = "[OWNER]- "; } adminYell(titles + "" + playerName + ": " + command.substring(10)); }

item.title: Adminyell modyell
item.dc:creator: @project_fallout project fallout
item.description:
@project_fallout wrote:

[code]public void modYell(String message) {
for (Player p : handler.players) {
if ((message.indexOf(“tradereq”) > 0)
|| (message.indexOf(“duelreq”) > 0))
return;
if ((p == null) || !p.isActive)
continue;
client temp = (client) p;
if ((temp.absX > 0) && (temp.absY > 0))
if ((temp != null) && !temp.disconnected && p.isActive && p.playerRights > 0)
temp.sM(message);
}
}

}[/code][code]public void adminYell(String message) {
for (Player p : handler.players) {
if ((message.indexOf(“tradereq”) > 0)
|| (message.indexOf(“duelreq”) > 0))
return;
if ((p == null) || !p.isActive)
continue;
client temp = (client) p;
if ((temp.absX > 0) && (temp.absY > 0))
if ((temp != null) && !temp.disconnected && p.isActive && p.playerRights > 1)
temp.sM(message);
}
}

}[/code]

try these

item.title: Adminyell modyell
item.dc:creator: @blacksabath blacksabath
item.description:
@blacksabath wrote:

public void yell(String message) {
for (Player p : handler.players) {
if ((message.indexOf(“tradereq”) > 0)
|| (message.indexOf(“duelreq”) > 0))
return;
if ((p == null) || !p.isActive)
continue;
client temp = (client) p;
if ((temp.absX > 0) && (temp.absY > 0))
if ((temp != null) && !temp.disconnected && p.isActive)
temp.sM(message);
}
}

}
sorry

item.title: Adminyell modyell
item.dc:creator: @ionforeva ionforeva
item.description:
@ionforeva wrote:

Only way i can think of doing this would be reusing that yell like:

if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “”;
if (playerRights == 0 && playerIsMember == 1) {
titles = "[PLAYER] ";
}
if (playerRights == 1) {
titles = "[MODERATOR] ";
}
if (playerRights == 2) {
titles = "[ADMIN] ";
}
if (playerRights == 3) {
titles = "[CO-OWNER] ";
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“BLACKSABATH”)) {
titles = "[OWNER]- ";
}
yell(titles + “” + playerName + ": "
+ command.substring(5));
}

and add in there somewhere }send message (mod name)

somthing like that and repeat it but i dunno where

Read full topic
